about_the_game:
Step into the mystical realm of Sacred Forest, where pixel art meets adrenaline-fueled action in a vibrant open-world adventure tailored for the bold and the brave.


As the spirited heroine of this pixelated odyssey, you'll wield your bow with the finesse of a seasoned marksman, navigating the lush 3D landscapes with a mix of agility and cunning. But your skills don't end there – with the ability to manipulate time itself, you'll slow it to a crawl, slipping into first-person mode to land those perfect shots with ease.


Take to the skies on the flutter of your cape, gliding gracefully over the verdant canopy below, or unleash your inner daredevil with the thrill of grappling arrows, swinging through the forest like a modern-day superhero.


Yet, amidst the beauty lies a dark secret – a malevolent blight has tainted the once-idyllic forest, unleashing legions of monstrous creatures upon its unsuspecting inhabitants. These aren't your run-of-the-mill foes, but twisted manifestations of lost souls, hungry for chaos and destruction.


It's up to you, intrepid adventurer, to uncover the mysteries of the forest and restore peace to its troubled lands. Embark on epic quests, face off against colossal beasts, and forge alliances with the forest's denizens as you fight to reclaim its lost glory.

With its captivating blend of innovative gameplay mechanics, stunning visuals, and a rich, immersive narrative, Sacred Forest offers an unforgettable journey that will leave you breathless and begging for more. Are you ready to answer the call of adventure and become the hero this forest desperately needs?

name: Sacred Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an open world adventure in Sacred Forest! Play as a pixel art heroine, master slow-mo archery, glide with your cape, and swing with grapple arrows. Battle blight-infected monsters, undertake epic quests, and restore balance to the forest!
